room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape Branson in Branson
review: Our family was visiting from Florida and had a great time solving the Lost Antidote escape room. Thanks for the fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape Branson in Branson
review: Fun way to spend a little time in Branson. Our group did the Lost Antidote room & we had a great time solving the clues. Will definitely be back to try out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape Branson in Branson
review: My husband and I took our grandchildren and we had a blast! It was so nice watching them work as a team to get the antidote! It was our first time to do this and we would recommend everyone to give it a try!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape Branson in Branson
review: I have been hearing about these escape rooms for quite some time now, but haven't gotten around to experiencing one! We have them back home in Louisiana so we decided to do one on vacation! Myself and my family did The Lost Antidote room and it was absolutely awesome!! Sooooo much fun!! I highly recommend it to all!! Definitely 5 stars!!!
